text: Tente tomara prati yi aratirna karaa haiche tara paraa kiba tumi barjana karaiba neki arau iyara dbaraa tomara mana sankucita ha’ba neki sihamtara e'i katha koraara babe ye, ‘tara ocarata dhana-bhandara kiya aratirna karaa nahaya athaba tara lagata phiraista kiya nahe’? Tumihe kerala ejana satarkakarai arau allaha sakalo bastura oparata karmabidhayaka
